About the Company: Jyothy Laboratories, Ltd. manufactures and distributes household products. The Company is engaged in manufacturing and marketing of fabric whiteners, soaps, detergents, mosquito coils and incense sticks. It operates in two segments: Soaps and Detergents and Home Care. Soaps and Detergents include fabric whiteners, fabric detergents, dish wash bar and soaps including ayurvedic soaps and Home Care products include incense sticks, dhoop and mosquito coils and scrubber, it also includes tea and coffee..The company also in the business activities of Home Care, Soaps and Detergents.
